data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Cañar to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cañar, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Cañar.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Cañar, Ecuador not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Cañar, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Spanish-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Spanish-speaking people know you.
Father, make bold the prophets in Cañar, Ecuador so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 58,200 people living in Cañar through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 6,153 believers in Cañar, Ecuador a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Cañar
location.people_groups_list: Tagaeri, Taromenane, Chachi, Achuar Jivaro, Secoya
